ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( DedicatedRep__c ) && ISPICKVAL(Referral_Source_Business_Type__c , 'Strategic Account') && ($Profile.Name <> 'MMS Sales ZSA - SB' && $Profile.Name <> 'Salesforce Support' && $Profile.Name <> 'Sales Data Steward' && $Profile.Name <> 'Bank Channel Manager' && NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Admin')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have access to edit Dedicated Rep field.
